text: Nomuli, gei au e hiihai labelaa bolo gi iloo eau togohaa manu dela e hai gee mo nia manu ala i golo. E hagamadagudagu dangada e hai ono niha baalanga llauehaa e hunahuna ai ana daangada ala e hiihai ginai gi ono madaniha baalanga mmee mo ono niha baalanga, ga nomuli ga dagadagahi digaula gi lala.
